## slu host

Get IP from domain

```
slu host <domain> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for host
  -4, --ipv4-only   Return IPv4 records only
  -6, --ipv6-only   Return IPv6 records only
      --json        Format output to JSON
      --one         Return only one IP address
```
